To ensure your table at Casa Pasta, we recommend making a reservation in advance. Our online reservation system is simple and convenient. Just specify the date and time, and we‚Äôll be ready to welcome you.

Events and Special Occasions
Casa Pasta is the perfect venue for your special events and celebrations. We offer event planning and catering services to make your occasion extraordinary. Whether you‚Äôre hosting a wedding reception, birthday party, or corporate gathering, we‚Äôll create an unforgettable experience for you and your guests.
quote event
EXCELLENT
Based on
1728 reviews
Francia Mousalli
July 1, 2025
I went with my family couple weeks ago and I have to say this is one of the places that has captured my heart! It‚Äôs cozy and comfortably  romantic place, I hope to get back to enjoy this place either for morning coffee or night special dinnerü§©
Veronica Zeppi
June 29, 2025
Food is phenomenal and Taygen is an amazing server!!!
Ester Bae
June 29, 2025
Food was excellent as was the service! The presentation of the food was beautiful as was the taste. I will definitely be coming again!
Humberto Lee
June 29, 2025
Everything was excellent! Their egg pasta was fresh, and every bite delicious.
Nabilah Miah
June 29, 2025
Such a great team our server Tanner and host Rodrigo who helped with a 20 plus group of girls for brunch. The service was absolutely phenomenal and they really took time and dedication to make this event very memorable. Such a clean, beautiful, and organized location in downtown Fort pierce. Highly recommend dinner, lunch, or the brunch! The food is absolutely delicious with clean pure ingredients. Highly recommend for a date night or family night!
Zudhieh Mohammad
June 29, 2025
This is my first time at casa pasta! And let me say this restaurant has exceeded my expectations. The brunch was amazing. The staff is great! If you want aesthetics this is the place. We were about 20 people and they attended to everyone timely with water, coffee and all our needs! We appreciate you casa pasta! ‚ù§Ô∏è
mariam Khan
June 29, 2025
What an amazing experience!!!
Absolutely loved our service and delicious food all made to perfection!!!
Must must try in our area one of the best!
Maryam
June 29, 2025
Went with a large group and they were so sweet and accommodating. Food was very good with a lot of variety for different diets and tastes as well. And everything was very fresh! Wonderful for cute girls brunch or dates. Even the kids enjoyed ‚ò∫Ô∏è
Danielle Kireyczyk
June 29, 2025
If you are looking for the most simplistic, delicious Italian cuisine in south Florida- come to Casa Pasta! You will not be disappointed. Also, the servers are beautiful and not bad to look at!
Sabrina Mestre
June 28, 2025
Great service as soon as we walked in! The food was really good. Our glasses were never left empty!!! Words from my 8 yr old, ‚Äúeveryone is so polite!‚Äù Between our waiter, manager, and other waiters we never went without the whole time! Will definitely be coming here again Obsessed!!!
Contact Us
Do you have questions or special requests? Our friendly and knowledgeable staff is here to assist you. Contact Casa Pasta via phone, email, or visit us in person. We look forward to serving you.
100 S 2nd St
Fort Pierce, FL 34950
USA
